title: My best league friend drove 14 hours to visit me :)
body:
I have been playing league with a guy for about 4 years. We have become really good friends over the years. He wanted a vacation so he drove 14 hours to visit me. I barely hear of these things actually happening. It is normally "Yeah we should meet up sometime." but it never happens. I am surprised he has showed up and it has been a lot of fun hanging with him IRL.

I just wanted to make a forum post saying gaming friends are real friends for anyone that doubts it. I doubt my friend will read this post but I am happy he took the trip and I'll be sad when he leaves.
